# Datasets

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}

collections <- sort(list.files(path = "./collections", pattern = "*.csv", full.names = TRUE))

for (filename in collections) {
  cat(sprintf("### %s\n", tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(filename))))
  
  collection <- read_csv(filename) %>% 
    arrange(description)
  
  for (i in 1:nrow(collection)) {
    cat(sprintf("- [%s](%s)\n", collection$description[i], collection$path[i]))
  }
}
```
